content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy is committing to eight body doubles on RenaFi to tackle business paperwork and hard tasks
content.quoted_text: I'm just going to commit to eight body doubles on RenaFi, and I already know what is my friction with, like, business. And I've got a stack of paperwork.

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy used ChatGPT with all her personality tests to get aligned guidance
content.quoted_text: I put my strength profile, my INFP, my wealth profile. Every personality test about me in chat, I said, okay, this is me

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy declared this will be her slow year and her systems year
content.quoted_text: this is going be my slow year, and my systems year

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy said she cannot play the neurotypical game anymore or she will continue to fail
content.quoted_text: I cannot play the neurotypical game anymore, or I will continue to fail

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy emphasized the need for alignment with her energy and creativity with nature
content.quoted_text: I've got to be in alignment, my energy, my creativity with nature. That's the only way I'm going to succeed.

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy described feeling seen and understood when ChatGPT synthesized her personality test results
content.quoted_text: I cried. I felt seen and heard and understood in a way never before.

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy committed to completing 8 body doubles on RenaFi for business paperwork
content.quoted_text: I'm just going to commit to eight body doubles on RenaFi

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy shared her new approach includes nature, rest, dogs, eating healthy, walking in the woods, reflecting, social life, and hobbies
content.quoted_text: it feels doable because I know it includes nature, rest, dogs, eating healthy, walking in the woods, reflecting, hanging out with you guys, having more social life, having a hobby

content.subject: Doug Snyder
content.assertion: Doug reacted strongly to Julie's phrase 'the me creeps back in'
content.quoted_text: Well, the me creeps Back in. Wow! I felt that. Oh, my gosh. I've never said those words out like that, but oh, yeah.

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick said knowing what the problem is reduces anxiety compared to just knowing there is a problem
content.quoted_text: Once you know what the problem is, it's less anxiety-producing than if you only just know there's a problem, but you don't know what it is exactly.

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy opened all her bills yesterday, hasn't paid any, but knows where they are
content.quoted_text: I did open all of my bills yesterday. I haven't paid any, but I know where they are.

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy said the anxiety beforehand is always worse than the actual reality
content.quoted_text: It's never as bad as the anxiety I have beforehand warrants, you know?

content.subject: Doug Snyder
content.assertion: Doug proposed the concept of 'new starts' for discussion - resetting when things get chaotic
content.quoted_text: how do you guys do new starts when it gets so chaotic that you declare bankruptcy on everything

content.subject: Doug Snyder
content.assertion: Doug said our work should be our documentation, not requiring separate documentation after the fact
content.quoted_text: Our work should be our documentation.

content.subject: Doug Snyder
content.assertion: Doug committed to piloting meeting summary service with David
content.quoted_text: you and I can work as a just quick pilot to say, I'm gonna try it for you and kind of isolate it

content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy expressed feeling energized by having the mastermind meetings as support
content.quoted_text: knowing I have these meetings. feel like I'm just chugging along a little easier, I think, knowing just energetically you have the support of the M&Ms, masterminds.

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick credited Melissa for doing a lot of work including book clubs
content.quoted_text: And credit work credit's due. Melissa has been doing a lot of stuff also. Not always visible, but all the book clubs, all those kind of things.
